MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY10 postcode areas of Anstruther. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30PM due to an underground cable fault and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area. For customers still without power we are still working to repair the fault on our underground electricity network on Shore Street. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:31PM on Tuesday, 09 March 2021.
